message: I understand you want a larger share, so I'm proposing a 45/55 split.  Let's settle this quickly before inflation eats into our gains.
Considering the inflation, I'll make a small concession, 58% for me
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. I'm proposing a 47/53 split.  Let's be reasonable and wrap this up before we both lose out significantly.
Inflation is hitting you harder, I'll take 57% and we can end this
This is getting ridiculous.  I'm proposing a 50/50 split. Take it or leave it.  Any more stalling and we both lose.
